column1: '''''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''. It has 25 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 186 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements.
[[File:The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Extended Edition - DVD cover.jpg
The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentary:

NOTE: The film is split over 2 discs for both the DVD and Blu-ray 3-D editions; the breaking point coming between chapters 23 & 24 (the Blu-ray 3-D edition also contains the regular 2-D Blu-ray version of the film as disc 3).
